question: Laich a ni 'total revenues net of interest expense' siunn koai-thinn ê nî-tsū?
Hia-ê nî ū siâⁿ-chē ê 'lī-chha phōaⁿ-chāi chūng-sûan' tī hit nî 'chôaⁿ chòe-ōe chāi-ōe phōaⁿ-chāi chūng-sûan' siōng-koân?
Lia̍h-chha chū 2016 kàu 2018 nî ê 'sûn-choân sit-chha' ê sann-nî-tōaⁿ chhiúⁿ-sè ūi-chāi ūi-chāi.
answer: ‘Sûn-choân sit-chha’ piáu-hiān chhut chi̍t-ê liân-sòaⁿ koh chin tiōng-iàu ê chiàng-ē chhiúⁿ-sè, tùi 2016 nî ê $435 pah-bān ê sò͘-tì kàu 2017 nî ê $149 pah-bān, koh chiàng kàu 2018 nî ê $21 pah-bān. Chit ê liân-sòaⁿ chiàng 66% koh 86% ê nî-tōaⁿ piàn-tōaⁿ chí-chāi kong-si ê sin-jīn tui-siā koán-lí he̍k chu-sìn ch quality ū chi̍t-ê tōa-pō͘-hūn ê kái-chìn.

question: Tui 2018 nî ū tiāⁿ-chûn ê siâu-bo̍k, chiūⁿ 2017 nî sī hui-tiāⁿ-chûn (lōe) ê, liè chhut lâi.
answer: income ( loss ) from continuing operations before taxes
net income ( loss ) before attribution of noncontrolling interests

question: Tī 2018 niâ, 'tsóng siu-jih kā pô-siong khó͘h-chè chāi liāu' ê pí-lu̍t sī 'tsóng cho̍at-tó͘ che̍k-sû' kāng-khoán ê toā-sè ê siá-chòe tōa-siáⁿ?
Nā 'credit reserve build ( release )' tī 2018 thè-kóa chòe-chòe 0, m̄-koh sī jiân chē ê $218 pah-bān, 'income ( loss ) from continuing operations before taxes' ē-sī siáⁿ-chóaⁿ?
'总收入（扣除利息支出后）' 和 '净收益（亏损）' 在这三年之间有直接的正相关吗？请解释。
answer: 无，看不出有直接的正相关。虽然收入从 2016 年的 52.33 亿美元稳步下降到 2018 年的 20.83 亿美元，但净收益剧烈波动，从 5.21 亿美元的盈利变成亏损 196.76 亿美元，又回升到 1.07 亿美元的盈利。2017 年出现巨额亏损，尽管当时的收入高于 2018 年，这主要是由于一项异常的‘所得税（收益）’项目，高达 190.64 亿美元，并非仅由收入变化引起。

question: Heng-choa ê koah, tāi-piáu nî-kó͘-chhin-nî kái-piàn, ū sióⁿ-mih koah siōng-chē 'nm' (bô-ì-gī) ê chu-liāu?
Chit-ê 2017 financial entry, tùi 2016 kap 2018 ê siau-chè lâi kóng sī chin tōa ê tōa-chúi, che hō͘ i ê chóng-kiat-kò͘ ū siáⁿ-chóng éng-hióng, chhiáⁿ kái-soeh.
answer: 2017 nî ê 'income taxes ( benefits )' ($19,064 pah-bān bí-kim) sī chin tōa ê tōa-chúi, chiap 2016 nî ê $-455 pah-bān bí-kim kap 2018 nî ê $-113 pah-bān bí-kim. Chit ê hui-siông tōa ê siu-chè chi-chhut sī chú-iàu ê in-sò͘, chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t ê tī chiân chè-chhut chi-chêng ê chha-siat $507 pah-bān bí-kim chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t ê tī āu chè-chhut chi-āu ê chha-siat $19,571 pah-bān bí-kim, chiâⁿ-chòe hit chi̍t nî ê chu-liāu tang-tiong siōng ū éng-hióng ê hui-siông chōng-hòng.

question: Tī 2016 chì 2018 nî, chiap-sû liâi (sún-sit) tī bān-goân bí-goân cōe-siàu-chē sèng chē?
